data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hosseininaveh, Fatemeh, Nozari, Jamasb, Kaydan, Mehmet Bora, Hosseininaveh, Vahid (2016): Molecular and morphological identification of pistachio armored scale insects (Hemiptera: Diaspididae), with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4200 (4): 523-543, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4200.4.5|20 occurrences
